segments.text: What certificates of technical qualification have you got ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have got a computer engineer's qualification certificate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you worked in a computer company before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes , I have . I worked part-time as a typewriter in a computer company when I was at college .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any ideas on this work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In my opinion , it has a broad prospect and it needs smart mind .
segments.speaker: S2
